actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: To make technical corrections to section 4406 of the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008.

summary.text: Amends the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 to replace "Food and Nutrition Act of 2008" with "Food Stamp Act of 1977" in a provision reauthorizing grant funds to assist eligible private nonprofit entities to establish and carry out community food projects. Makes such grant funds for FY2008 available until September 30, 2009, to fund proposals solicited in FY2008.

titles.title: To make technical corrections to section 4406 of the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008.
